ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 150 50 explosion damage (30m)

skillTree.name: Guerrilla Fighter
skillTree.description: Whereby the terrain itself is both shield and weapon, enabling the Lizardmen to both mask their numbers and surprise the foe.

skillTree.name: Natural Camouflage
skillTree.description: Some Lizardmen are able to seamlessly blend in with their jungle environment in order to observe, or defend themselves from, their enemies.

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Divinatory Authority
skillTree.description: The Oracle’s divining presence can anchor the impassiveness of the braves around him in the most heated of battles.

skillTree.name: Augury
skillTree.description: An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.

skillTree.name: Venomous Spit
skillTree.description: Spitting toxic bile, the Troglodon triangulates its victim’s location as the fluid sizzles upon searing flesh.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

ui_effects.description: ➕ Explosion does not affect friendly troops
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 1000 0 damage and 500 0 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 1000 0 damage and 500 0 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 1000 0 damage and 500 0 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 1000 0 damage and 500 0 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 1000 0 damage and 500 0 explosion damage (8m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fireball Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: ➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wind Blast"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 10% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 20% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Arrogant
skillTree.description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

skillTree.name: Humble
skillTree.description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

skillTree.name: Pompous
skillTree.description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."

skillTree.name: Uncompromising
skillTree.description: "The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Vigorous
skillTree.description: A skink that never gets tired or hungy.

skillTree.name: Kroxigor Leader
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen follow him and respect him.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
Armour: +5 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
Charge bonus: +5 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units

skillTree.name: Skink Master
skillTree.description: Leader of many skink generations.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
Speed: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Recruit rank: +1 for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units

skillTree.name: Sky Rider
skillTree.description: To the skies!

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
Missile strength: +5% for Terradon Riders units

skillTree.name: Survivor
skillTree.description: Survivor and shepard of his kind.
